name: Trapped on Monster Island
description:
Forced to work on a passenger ship as a servant, Elise finds herself praying for a way out of her situation.
When one fateful day, she finds her prayers answered, the results are not what she bargained for. The ship is unexpectedly struck by a powerful storm, causing it capsize.
The next thing she knows, she awakes on a mysterious island. What brought her here, and for what purpose? Elise must begin exploring the island to find out.Features:Classic turn-based RPG
Explore a mysterious island
Recruit monsters to fight alongside Elise
Each monster has a unique skillset
